fields.Title: CANAL / WATERLOCK LEVER
fields.Description: this is the button-switch-lever-thing that closes the waterlock once it's been fixed on day 3

fields.Title: You: "So the coast is closed off. Is this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So the coast is closed off. Is this why Lena's husband Morell the cryptozoologist hasn't returned?

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere() == false

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Focus on one thing, achieve it, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Focus on one thing, achieve it, then the next... he thinks. That's the task chain.

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "Nothing happens. A cold gust of win..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing happens. A cold gust of wind blowing in from the sea interrupts the silence of the situation.

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "The water lock starts moving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The water lock starts moving...

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A couple of indicator lights are mi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A couple of indicator lights are missing from this control panel. Loose wires dangle from the now-vacant holes. In the middle is a lever -- beneath it, a small metal plaque.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wait... Could this be why Morell ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait... Could this be why Morell hasn't returned to Lena?

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Isn't there a sign over there sayin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Isn't there a sign over there saying functionality will be restored on Wednesday morning?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right." The lieutenant looks a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All right." The lieutenant looks across the canal. "We can go to the coast now. Expect rugged terrain -- and drunks."
fields.Alternate1: "All right." The lieutenant looks across the canal. "We can go to the coast now. Expect rugged terrain -- and drunks. And if you wanted to forge that document for Evrart, now you can..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Looks like it, yes. We should prob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like it, yes. We should probably go tell Lena. Take a load off her mind."

fields.Title: You: "Release the lever."
fields.Dialogue Text: Release the lever.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Wasn't there a sign over there sayi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wasn't there a sign over there saying functionality will be restored on Wednesday morning?

fields.Title: You: ""So the coast is closed off. This m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So the coast is closed off. This may be why Lena's husband Morell the cryptozoologist hasn't returned."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Logic: "You should probably tell Lena. It'l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should probably tell Lena. It'll take a load off her mind.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "You pull the lever all the way up u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You pull the lever all the way up until the metal clicks against the contact pins. You hear a soft *clunk*, then...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay..." The lieutenant looks acro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay..." The lieutenant looks across the canal. "If we ever need to get to the coast, then this is the way. But please, contain your *wanderlust* for now. I don't want us to get sidetracked. Not with everything that's going on."
fields.Alternate1: "All right." the lieutenant looks across the canal. "We can go to the coast now. Expect rugged terrain -- and drunks. And if you wanted to forge that document for Evrart, now you can..."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "This panel usually closes the water..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This panel usually closes the water lock, turning it into a bridge that lets you cross the canal -- but there's a crashed "Samaran butter" sign in the way. Pulling the lever *probably* won't do anything.

fields.Title: Man on water lock: "The man watches you in silence, ver..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man watches you in silence, very slowly cutting off another slice of his salami and putting it in his mouth.

fields.Title: Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  Variable["canal.lock_logic_wait"] == false
Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  Variable["canal.lock_logic_wait"] == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  Variable["canal.lock_logic_wait"] == false

fields.Title: !(Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  Variable["canal.lock_logic_wait"] == false)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["canal.know_water_lock_time"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell"]  and  Variable["TASK.locate_morell_done"] == false  and  Variable["canal.lock_logic_wait"] == false) == false

fields.Title: Logic: "Could this be why Morell hasn't ret..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Could this be why Morell hasn't returned to Lena?

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "You grab the handle and pull the le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You grab the handle and pull the lever up. As soon as the metal connects against the contact pins you hear a loud *clunk*, then...

fields.Title: You: "Push it HARDER."
fields.Dialogue Text: Push it HARDER.

fields.Title: You: "Pull the lever -- again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull the lever -- again.

fields.Title: Empathy: "She *was* quite worried..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She *was* quite worried...

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with loose..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A rusting control panel with loose wires dangling out from the hole where an indicator light used to be, and a mechanical lever sitting in the middle.

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "A spring brings the lever back to i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A spring brings the lever back to its original position. You still need to close the water lock to get across the canal -- some other way.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mm-hmm." The lieutenant hums to hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mm-hmm." The lieutenant hums to himself while staring at your activities.

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "The Water Lock Control Panel doesn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Water Lock Control Panel doesn't make for much of a partner, but yeah -- why not.

fields.Title: You: "Pull the lever up."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull the lever up.

fields.Title: Water Lock Control Panel: "Nothing happens."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing happens.
